channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 10 Best Reusable Water Bottles of 2025, Tested & Reviewed
item.description: Stay hydrated in style and cut down on single-use plastic with our favorite bottles—now updated with information on lead.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Review: Super Thin With a Catch
item.description: The wonders of a thin phone quickly disappear when you have to baby the battery life.

item.title: Last 24 hours: TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 Early Bird Deals will fly away after today
item.description: Just 24 hours left to lock in Early Bird pricing for TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 — happening October 27–29 at Moscone West in San Francisco. Save up to $9...

item.title: Why Intempus thinks robots should have a human physiological state
item.description: Teddy Warner, 19, has always been interested in robotics. His family was in the industry, and he says he “grew up” working in a machinist shop while i...

item.title: 48 hours left: What you won’t want to miss at the 20th TechCrunch Disrupt in October
item.description: ​​There are just 48 hours left to save up to $900 on your ticket to TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 — and get 90% off the second. After May 25 at 11:59 p.m. P...

item.title: Tesla opened Cybertruck trade-ins, and the numbers aren’t pretty
item.description: Per Inside EVs, Cybertruck owners are now allowed by Tesla to trade in their cars for the first time since they hit the market – but they’ll incur a h...

item.title: We Hand-Picked the 61 Best Deals From the 2025 REI Anniversary Sale
item.description: It’s the best time of year to pick up all the tents, stoves, sleeping bags, and gear you’ll need for summer fun.

item.title: The Quest to Prove the Existence of a New Type of Quantum Particle
item.description: A new proposal makes the case that paraparticles—a new category of quantum particle—could be created in exotic materials.

item.title: From LLMs to hallucinations, here’s a simple guide to common AI terms
item.description: We thought it would be helpful to put together a glossary with definitions of some of the most important words and phrases that we use in our articles...

item.title: 22 Best Memorial Day Mattress and Bedding Sales (2025)
item.description: The year's best Memorial Day mattress and bedding sales on WIRED-tested products from Avocado, Helix, Brooklinen, Buffy, and more.
